import time
import argparse
from types import SimpleNamespace

# Benchmark script for sglang.srt.server_args

def bench_instantiate(n=50000):
    start = time.time()
    from sglang.srt.server_args import ServerArgs
    for _ in range(n):
        # Avoid randomness in __post_init__ to stabilize timings
        ServerArgs(
            model_path="dummy",
            tokenizer_path=None,
            tokenizer_mode="auto",
            load_format="auto",
            dtype="auto",
            trust_remote_code=True,
            context_length=None,
            quantization=None,
            chat_template=None,
            host="127.0.0.1",
            port=30000,
            additional_ports=None,
            mem_fraction_static=None,
            max_prefill_tokens=None,
            max_running_requests=None,
            schedule_heuristic="lpm",
            schedule_conservativeness=0.8,
            tp_size=1,
            stream_interval=8,
            random_seed=0,
            log_level="info",
            log_level_http=None,
            log_requests=False,
            show_time_cost=False,
            api_key="",
            dp_size=1,
            load_balance_method="round_robin",
            disable_flashinfer=False,
            disable_radix_cache=False,
            disable_regex_jump_forward=False,
            disable_cuda_graph=False,
            disable_disk_cache=False,
            attention_reduce_in_fp32=False,
            enable_p2p_check=False,
            nccl_init_addr=None,
            nnodes=1,
            node_rank=None,
        )
    end = time.time()
    return end - start


def bench_from_cli_args(n=20000):
    start = time.time()
    from sglang.srt.server_args import ServerArgs
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(add_help=False)
    ServerArgs.add_cli_args(parser)
    # Build a Namespace with all fields to avoid parsing cost; focus on from_cli_args
    # Defaults mostly align with dataclass defaults, keep deterministic values
    base = {
        'model_path': 'dummy',
        'tokenizer_path': None,
        'tokenizer_mode': 'auto',
        'load_format': 'auto',
        'dtype': 'auto',
        'trust_remote_code': True,
        'context_length': None,
        'quantization': None,
        'chat_template': None,
        'host': '127.0.0.1',
        'port': 30000,
        'additional_ports': None,
        'mem_fraction_static': None,
        'max_prefill_tokens': None,
        'max_running_requests': None,
        'schedule_heuristic': 'lpm',
        'schedule_conservativeness': 0.8,
        'tp_size': 1,
        'stream_interval': 8,
        'random_seed': 0,
        'log_level': 'info',
        'log_level_http': None,
        'log_requests': False,
        'show_time_cost': False,
        'api_key': '',
        'dp_size': 1,
        'load_balance_method': 'round_robin',
        'disable_flashinfer': False,
        'disable_radix_cache': False,
        'disable_regex_jump_forward': False,
        'disable_cuda_graph': False,
        'disable_disk_cache': False,
        'attention_reduce_in_fp32': False,
        'enable_p2p_check': False,
        'nccl_init_addr': None,
        'nnodes': 1,
        'node_rank': None,
    }
    for _ in range(n):
        args = SimpleNamespace(**base)
        ServerArgs.from_cli_args(args)
    end = time.time()
    return end - start


if __name__ == "__main__":
    t1 = bench_instantiate()
    t2 = bench_from_cli_args()
    print({"instantiate_s": round(t1, 6), "from_cli_args_s": round(t2, 6)})

import time
import argparse
from types import SimpleNamespace

# Benchmark script for sglang.srt.server_args

def bench_instantiate(n=50000):
    start = time.time()
    from sglang.srt.server_args import ServerArgs
    for _ in range(n):
        # Avoid randomness in __post_init__ to stabilize timings
        ServerArgs(
            model_path="dummy",
            tokenizer_path=None,
            tokenizer_mode="auto",
            load_format="auto",
            dtype="auto",
            trust_remote_code=True,
            context_length=None,
            quantization=None,
            chat_template=None,
            host="127.0.0.1",
            port=30000,
            additional_ports=None,
            mem_fraction_static=None,
            max_prefill_tokens=None,
            max_running_requests=None,
            schedule_heuristic="lpm",
            schedule_conservativeness=0.8,
            tp_size=1,
            stream_interval=8,
            random_seed=0,
            log_level="info",
            log_level_http=None,
            log_requests=False,
            show_time_cost=False,
            api_key="",
            dp_size=1,
            load_balance_method="round_robin",
            disable_flashinfer=False,
            disable_radix_cache=False,
            disable_regex_jump_forward=False,
            disable_cuda_graph=False,
            disable_disk_cache=False,
            attention_reduce_in_fp32=False,
            enable_p2p_check=False,
            nccl_init_addr=None,
            nnodes=1,
            node_rank=None,
        )
    end = time.time()
    return end - start


def bench_from_cli_args(n=20000):
    start = time.time()
    from sglang.srt.server_args import ServerArgs
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(add_help=False)
    ServerArgs.add_cli_args(parser)
    # Build a Namespace with all fields to avoid parsing cost; focus on from_cli_args
    # Defaults mostly align with dataclass defaults, keep deterministic values
    base = {
        'model_path': 'dummy',
        'tokenizer_path': None,
        'tokenizer_mode': 'auto',
        'load_format': 'auto',
        'dtype': 'auto',
        'trust_remote_code': True,
        'context_length': None,
        'quantization': None,
        'chat_template': None,
        'host': '127.0.0.1',
        'port': 30000,
        'additional_ports': None,
        'mem_fraction_static': None,
        'max_prefill_tokens': None,
        'max_running_requests': None,
        'schedule_heuristic': 'lpm',
        'schedule_conservativeness': 0.8,
        'tp_size': 1,
        'stream_interval': 8,
        'random_seed': 0,
        'log_level': 'info',
        'log_level_http': None,
        'log_requests': False,
        'show_time_cost': False,
        'api_key': '',
        'dp_size': 1,
        'load_balance_method': 'round_robin',
        'disable_flashinfer': False,
        'disable_radix_cache': False,
        'disable_regex_jump_forward': False,
        'disable_cuda_graph': False,
        'disable_disk_cache': False,
        'attention_reduce_in_fp32': False,
        'enable_p2p_check': False,
        'nccl_init_addr': None,
        'nnodes': 1,
        'node_rank': None,
    }
    for _ in range(n):
        args = SimpleNamespace(**base)
        ServerArgs.from_cli_args(args)
    end = time.time()
    return end - start


if __name__ == "__main__":
    t1 = bench_instantiate()
    t2 = bench_from_cli_args()
    print({"instantiate_s": round(t1, 6), "from_cli_args_s": round(t2, 6)})

if str(PYTHON_DIR) not in sys.path:
    sys.path.insert(0, str(PYTHON_DIR))

# Benchmark script for sglang.srt.server_args

def bench_instantiate(n=50000):
    start = time.time()
    from sglang.srt.server_args import ServerArgs
    for _ in range(n):
        # Avoid randomness in __post_init__ to stabilize timings
        ServerArgs(
            model_path="dummy",
            tokenizer_path=None,
            tokenizer_mode="auto",
            load_format="auto",
            dtype="auto",

            context_length=None,
            quantization=None,

            additional_ports=None,

            max_running_requests=None,
            schedule_heuristic="lpm",
            schedule_conservativeness=0.8,
            tp_size=1,
            stream_interval=8,
            random_seed=0,
            log_level="info",
            log_level_http=None,
            log_requests=False,
            show_time_cost=False,
            api_key="",

            load_balance_method="round_robin",

            disable_regex_jump_forward=False,

            attention_reduce_in_fp32=False,
            enable_p2p_check=False,
            nccl_init_addr=None,
            nnodes=1,
            node_rank=None,
        )
    end = time.time()
    return end - start


def bench_from_cli_args(n=20000):
    start = time.time()
    from sglang.srt.server_args import ServerArgs
